price: 47. Dheh (Nabiyow): Waxaan idin weydiiyo oo ajar ah, waa waxaad idinku leedihiin19. ajarkeyga waxaan ka sugayaa Alle  Keliya. Wax walbana Alle wuu u Jeedaa.
arabic: قُلۡ مَا سَأَلۡتُكُم مِّنۡ أَجۡرٖ فَهُوَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٞ
footnotes: 19. Rasuulka Alle s.c.w. kama dalbo wax abaal gud ah iyaga, ee wuxuu ka dalbaa inay rumeeyaan Alle oo camallo san fashaan, sidaasina iyagay khayr u tahay.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul mā sa-altukum min ajrin fahuwa lakum in ajriya illā ʿalā al-lahi wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin shahīdun
